ti:translation.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War (English - Thomas Hobbes translator)
ti:translation.ti:description: The English works of Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury. Thucydides. Thomas Hobbes. translator. London. Bohn. 1843.

ti:translation.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War (English - Benjamin Jowett translator)
ti:translation.ti:description: Thucydides translated into English; with introduction, marginal analysis, notes, and indices. Volume 1. Thucydides. Benjamin Jowett. translator. Oxford. Clarendon Press. 1881

ti:translation.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War (English - E.P. Dutton)
ti:translation.ti:description: Thucydides. The Peloponnesian War. London, J. M. Dent; New York, E. P. Dutton. 1910.

ti:translation.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War (German. Ed. A. Warmund)
ti:translation.ti:description: Geschichte des Peloponnesischen Kriegs. Vol. 1. Ed. A. Warmund. 1864

ti:translation.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War (German Ed. - T. Braun)
ti:translation.ti:description: Thucydides, creator; Braun, Theodor, 1877-1946, editor, translator

ti:translation.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War (French. Marie Charles Zévort translator.)
ti:translation.ti:description: Histoire de la Guerre du Péloponnése, vol. 1, Traduit par Marie Charles Zévort (1852) Paris: Charpentier.

ti:edition.ti:label: History of the Peloponnesian War
ti:edition.ti:description: Thucydides. Historiae. Jones, Henry Stuart, editor. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1910. (1942 printing).
